channel.title: [SFM] Rokugan FM {Game Thread} - Day 1 (1/1) - The Lying Darkness (WazzaAzza) won!
channel.description:
# Rokugan FM - Game Thread https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-rokugan-fm-22-22-choose-your-clan-also-need-replacements/80748
# Players
The setup can run at both 17 and 22 players, but runs better at 22!
1. Hippolytus 2. Marshal 3. Jgoesgaming 4. Vulgard 5. Alice 6. Arete 7. Napoleon 8. KyoDaz 9. BlueStorm 10. SDaL 11. Gypyx 12. DryBones 13. Nightfall 14. Emilia 15. Italy 16. Redrover1760 17. Sulit 18. DatBird 19. Zone 20. Tilgarial 21. WazzaAzza 22. Yuzen.19

item.title: [SFM] Rokugan FM {Game Thread} - Day 1 (1/1) - The Lying Darkness (WazzaAzza) won!
item.dc:creator: Redrover1760
item.description:
Dude the Lying Darkness is literally the best title for Wazza I’ve ever seen. It perfectly captures the image of Wazza lying around basically almost telling the truth and waiting as everyone casually votes her to win.

Read full topic

item.description:
